meanings.definition: A person who possesses exceptional intelligence and knowledge.
meanings.sent1: The superintellectuals in our class always have the answers to difficult questions.
meanings.sent2: The superintellectuals at the conference impressed everyone with their insights.
meanings.sent3: The superintellectuals had a friendly debate about quantum physics over lunch.
meanings.sent4: Among the students, she stood out like a superintellectual shooting star.
meanings.sent5: The superintellectuals' minds were like powerful engines, always running at full speed.

meanings.definition: The group of individuals who are considered to be highly intellectual and knowledgeable.
meanings.sent1: During the book club meeting, the superintellectuals shared their favorite authors.
meanings.sent2: The superintellectuals gathered at the library to discuss philosophy and literature.
meanings.sent3: At the party, the superintellectuals joked about the complexities of life.
meanings.sent4: In the academic world, they were the superintellectuals leading the way.
meanings.sent5: The superintellectuals' conversations were like a symphony of brilliant minds coming together.
